title: Delft Hyperloop
description: Member of the Delft Hyperloop team for the SpaceX Pod Competition. Built the public website (Django) and created a test and control system for realâ€‘time vehicle operations.

modal.title: Delft Hyperloop
modal.description: I was part of the Delft Hyperloop team in the SpaceX Hyperloop Pod Competition 2018, founded by Elon Musk. I developed the Delft Hyperloop website (using Django), attracting sponsors and media attention. Additionally, I created a test system to optimize the pod's performance and a control interface for real-time vehicle management and safety checks, ensuring smooth and safe operations during tests and the competition.

challenges.title: Challenges & Solutions
challenges.description: Implementing real-time data visualization for vehicle telemetry while ensuring the system could handle high-frequency sensor data updates and maintain performance during critical competition scenarios.

features.title: Key Features
list: Dynamic website with sponsor showcase and media gallery
